jcr:content.jcr:title: Adobe Shape CC
jcr:content.browserTitle: Capture images and convert raster to vector | Adobe Shape CC
jcr:content.metaDescription: Adobe Shape CC lets you capture images on your iPhone, iPad or Android device and convert raster shapes to vector graphics.

text_3da3.text:
Where ideas take shape.
 
Capture shapes with your iPhone, iPad or Android device and Adobe Shape CC will turn them into vectors you can use in your designs. Save them to Creative Cloud Libraries for quick access in other Adobe apps. And now you can also share your libraries with your creative team.
 
Update: Adobe Shape CC features are now available as part of Adobe Capture CC.

text_5855.text: Adobe Capture CC

text_5ac3.text: For iPhone and iPad

text_6557.text: For Android

text_145e.text:
Shape in action.

Capture shapes with your iPhone, iPad or Android device. Or use images from your camera roll or Adobe Creative Cloud. Shape converts them to high-fidelity vectors that you can use in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign and Illustrator Draw.

text_68f9.text:
Capture shapes anywhere
Simply take pictures of shapes you like with your mobile device and you can start turning the world around you into vector shapes.

text_b997.text:
Creative Cloud Libraries
Your shapes can be saved to Creative Cloud Libraries for quick access in Adobe apps like Photoshop, Illustrator and Draw. And now you can share your libraries with your team directly from Shape.

text_4fd4.text:
Easily edit and refine
Use your fingertip to precisely edit and refine your shape to get it exactly the way you want.

text_8c13.text:
Access shapes with Adobe Slide
Use Adobe Slide and Touch Slide to precisely place the shapes you’ve captured in your Draw sketches.

text_50e2.text:
Share shapes with anyone
It’s simple to share ideas with clients and colleagues. Email or text specific shapes, or share entire libraries straight from the app.

text_5937.text:
Learn & Support
Learn Shape with our easy-to-follow tutorials, or find answers in the forums and FAQ.

text_dd2e.text: Get started

text_69d7.text: Common questions

text_4be9.text: Ask the community

text_6605.text:
Connected to Creative Cloud.
 
Save your shapes to Creative Cloud Libraries so they’re accessible — along with creative assets such as your color themes and brushes — in other Adobe desktop and mobile apps. You can also share your libraries with your team directly from Shape.
 
Creative Cloud brings together the world’s best creative apps for desktop and mobile, plus more connected ways of creating and sharing. Learn more ›

text_b3cc.text:
Adobe Capture CC
Create production-ready assets anytime, anywhere.
